Episodes.Title: Jeremy Therapised
Episodes.Plot: Mark has asked Dobby to move in with him, and Jeremy is faced with the prospect of moving out to make way. But Jeremy has been dragging his heels and Mark is increasingly worried that Dobby will move in with his rival, Gerrard instead.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Business Secrets of the Pharaohs
Episodes.Plot: Mark gets a lucky break when his book, 'Business Secrets of the Pharaohs', is accepted by a 'publisher'. Jeremy, in an attempt to kick-start his career, enrols on a life-coaching course.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use & offensive language

Episodes.Title: The Love Bunker
Episodes.Plot: Simon, Dobby's ex-boyfriend, invites Mark, Dobby, Jeremy and Superhans to join him and his friends for a paintballing weekend. Mark is convinced that Simon is using the weekend as a cover to get back with Dobby, and Jeremy is convinced he can life coach Neil, Simon's best friend.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Big Mad Andy
Episodes.Plot:
Jeremy finally agrees to leave the flat and move in with Super Hans. Mark employs a decorator, Andy, to repaint the kitchen, and Jeremy helps out by giving him free 'life-coaching' advice.

Meanwhile, Mark enrolls on a business studies evening course and meets Stephanie an attractive older woman.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Chairman Mark
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy, desperate to avoid living with Superhans, sparks up an old relationship with Mark's siser Sara, and moves in with her and her five-year-old son, Joshy. Mark, meanwhile, in an attempt to deal with a damp patch on his bedroom wall, launches a campaign to be elected chairman of the freehold committee of Apollo House.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Quantocking II
Episodes.Plot: Dobby is offered a job in New York by ex-boyfriend Simon. Uncertain about the offer, Dobby suggests that she and Mark spend a weekend in the country. The perfect time, as far as Jeremy is concerned, to get a few things off his chest.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, sexual content, drug use & offensive language
Episodes.Writer: Simon Blackwell, Jesse Armstrong, Sam Bain
